summary: As election time nears, current Triad chairman Lok (Yam) faces competition from his godsons. At the same time, Jimmy (Koo) looks to increase his business relations with mainland China.
cast: Louis Koo|Simon Yam|Nick Cheung|Ka Tung Lam|Suet Lam|Eddie Cheung|Tian-Lin Wang|Mark Cheng|Bing-Man Tam|Yue-Tong Pan|Andy On|Yong You|Mo-Hau Cheung|Bun Yuen|Shing Lun Mok|Jonathan Yat-Sing Lee|Sze Yan Wong|Alan Chung San Chui|Chiang Lo|Chi-Shing Chiu|Ching-Ting Law|Pui Chung Tong|Wing-Cheung Cheung|Chi-Ping Chang|Shao-Chia Chen|Jianjun Zhou|Fa-Yuan Li|Brenda Chan|Man Kit Fan|Chun Pong Ling|Hsin Shen|Shao-Peng Chen|Yiu-Wing Chin|Cho-Kuen Chu|Wong Yin Keung|Long-Ming Lee|Tze Ming Lee|Shing-Hung Leung|Chi-Hung Ling|Wai Kit Mak|Man-Biu Pak
title: Hak se wui: Yi woo wai kwai
